results.title: Pancreatic cystic lesions in diabetes mellitus patients
results.text_hl: It is noteworthy that in 71.4% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in our study @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases_Cystic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052177 @@@cystic lesions@@@ were detected.

citations.NLM: Rozek M, Lipinski M, Jozefik E, Znajdek Z, Kiziak M, Sznurkowska M, Tatur J, Degowska M, Rydzewska G. Pancreatic cystic lesions in diabetes mellitus patients Prz Gastroenterol. 2021;16(1):62-66. PMID: 33986890

results.title: Salsalate, but not metformin or canagliflozin, slows kidney cyst growth in an adult-onset mouse model of polycystic kidney disease
results.text_hl: Although @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment had been shown to attenuate experimental @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases_Cystic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052177 @@@cystic kidney disease@@@, there are concerns that therapeutic @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ activation in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ kidney might require a higher oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose than can be achieved clinically.

citations.NLM: Leonhard WN, Song X, Kanhai AA, Iliuta IA, Bozovic A, Steinberg GR, Peters DJM, Pei Y. Salsalate, but not metformin or canagliflozin, slows kidney cyst growth in an adult-onset mouse model of polycystic kidney disease EBioMedicine. 2019 Sep;47():436-445. PMID: 31473186
citations.BibTeX: @article{31473186, title={Salsalate, but not metformin or canagliflozin, slows kidney cyst growth in an adult-onset mouse model of polycystic kidney disease}, author={Leonhard WN and Song X and Kanhai AA and Iliuta IA and Bozovic A and Steinberg GR and Peters DJM and Pei Y}, journal={EBioMedicine}, volume={47}, pages={436-445}}

results.title: Low-dose 2-deoxyglucose and metformin synergically inhibit proliferation of human polycystic kidney cells by modulating glucose metabolism
results.text_hl: ...Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@MET@@@) on proliferation of @DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007690 @@@polycystic kidney@@@ epithelial cells
